title: Window Focus on drag and drop
content: Hello. when drag and drop images/files from windows explorer or from any other apps, into firefox, firefox window does NOT focus. Is there anyway to fix this?

title: Firefox is not restoring my old tabs due to there being a crash after update and I have tried everything everyone provide here.
content: I recently update to the new Firefox and when it was update there was a tab where I could "restore all windows & tabs" before the update. But it would keep crashing until I end it form the task manger but this made it worse. As now I can not even access my old tabs and there are no tabs to restore. I have search up most of the common solutions but none of them work for me. I want to know if there are anymore solutions to get back my old tabs form before the update. Could I go back to the previous window or do I have to stay like this?
creator: cooldeath66

title: Reloading page(tab) button

title: Unable to remove "Other Bookmark" Folder
content: Hello, The bookmark toolbar has a FOLDER called "Other Bookmarks" just appeared out of nowhere and I just noticed it. It contained 4-5 links which I deleted assuming this would delete the folder and I added a random bookmark to see if that might do anything. No! I have searched for fixes including going into "About:Config" chamed tried changing the command (i.e., browser.toolbars.bookmarks.showotherbookmarks, and other similar commands from True to False), none of this did anything. There is no right-click command over the folder, "Show Bookmarks" as you can see in the screen shot. I need to get rid of this, as it is taking up valuable real estate and is an eyesore so to speak. Again, this just popped out of nowhere when I was moving/deleting bookmarks on the toolbar that wouldn't cause this folder to appear out of nowhere. Thank you in advance. I do hope someone can help!
creator: StevenLAX16

title: Page refused to load.
content:
Today I try to log on to SOCALGAS. This is the Gas company for all of southern cal. using a recently updated version of Firefox browser. The problem started : After logging into site , the next page refused to load. It just recycled over and over again. I open another browser : Bing and the pages needed to pay my mom's bills loaded. After calling the Gas company with my problem I realized the problem was the browser. 

How do I fix this problem?

Arthur
creator: slowslo

title: Mandaram eu ativar os COOKIES pra acessar a área de AJUDA e agora não só o navegador já era como meu notebook.
content: Hoje fiz duas atualizações seguidas, não sei qual a razão de duas atualizações no mesmo dia, e, primeiro demorei 3h pra abrir um site pelo Mozilla, tendo que abrir a ajuda pelo Google Chrome. Agora estou beirando as 6h pra acessar essa merda novamente! Parece ridiculo! Desde que reativei os cookies pra logar nessa página do Mozilla, tudo piorou no meu notebook. É impressionante como vocês não servem pra NADA, pra ABSOLUTAMENTE NADA!!!! E ai eu entro aqui, com 87% de Memória sendo consumida pelo MOZILLA Computador ao mesmo tempo funcionando tranquilamente E adivinhem? Tudo passa a funcionar quando abre a página de digitar a reclamação. Se isso não é sacanagem, o que é? Tenho que vir aqui TODO DIA pra acessar essa merda? Volto a repetir TODO FUNCIONÁRIO DESSA EMPRESA DEVERIA ENCONTRAR ALGUÉM DISPOSTO A ARRANCAR O SORRISO DELE!! VAI TOMAR NO CU, EMPRESA FILHA DA PUTA!! Todas as atualizações que já fiz nos últimos 5 anos não resultaram em NENHUMA MELHORIA DO NAVEGADOR. Pelo contrário, TUDO PIOROU !!! Já teve dia de fazer mais de 3 atualizações, no mesmo dia, e só piorar!! Falta de respeito TOTAL !!!!
creator: hugocarvalho.cs
